item.title: Making Floors?
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

Can you make floors, or ground, server-side? Or does it have to be client-side? If it is server side tell me if this would work for floors…

if (command.startsWith("floor") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Corey")) { try { int tile = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6,9)); makeGlobalObject(absX,absY-1,tile,1,22); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Bad tile ID"); } }
That is just to test making floors before actually putting them in. If that works can i use it on already placed ground and will it override it, or do i have to go the black area, like no ground.

Read full topic
